actions.delete_deliveries_with_errors: Delete deliveries with errors to continue

support.body: Type your request on the following space. You will be receiving a reply shortly.
support.message:
If it is a mistake, please describe:
Steps to reproduce it, result obtained, expected result and, if possible, attache a screenshot to the error/problem. If it is an operation's question, please explain in detail what you need to know.
support.thanks: Thank you for using our system.
support.title: Customer Service
support.subject: Subject

create.success: ¡Los datos de facturación se crearon éxitosamente!

remove.confirmation: ¿Estás seguro que querés eliminar estos datos de facturación?
remove.success: ¡Los datos de facturación se eliminaron éxitosamente!

update.success: ¡Los datos de facturación se actualizaron éxitosamente!

create.success: Nuevo punto de entrega se creó éxitosamente!

remove.confirmation: ¿Estás seguro que querés eliminar este punto de entrega?
remove.success: ¡El punto de entrega se eliminó éxitosamente!

update.success: ¡El punto de entrega se actualizó éxitosamente!
La lista de precios ha sido cargada correctamente
update.error: Error al actualizar la lista de precios

server_error.title: Error in Product List Upload
server_error.message: If the problems persist, communicate with support@extendeal.com

file_not_selected.title: Product list not selected
file_not_selected.message: First you must select a list of products to proceed to upload it

validation.numeric: The price of the product must be numeric
validation.boolean: The column %entity% can only have 1 or 0

price_update.title: Price list update
price_update.content: The updated products are shown in the cart with a yellow notification.
price_update.help: Products with a yellow mark have recently changed their price.

price_update.title: Price modification alert
price_update.content: A price actualization of your products has been made, they will be seen on your cart. You can keep on buying or discard your current order.

discard_product.title: Discard products
discard_product.content: All the products whose prices have been modified will be discarded from the order.

eight_orders_alert.title: last 8 orders
eight_orders_alert.content: Visualize the quantities of the products ordered in the last eight orders identified with their issue date.

news_alert.title: Cart: Locate product
news_alert.content: Learn about the new way to locate a product from the Shopping Cart. Position yourself on the product with the mouse and click on the magnifying glass to activate the search engine with that product.

cart_alert.title: Cart
cart_alert.content: Now during your purchase, you will have the possibility to hide or visualize the Cart by clicking on the icon above.

new_aesthetic.title: New aesthetics
new_aesthetic.page_1: We renewed our aesthetics for easier and clearer navigation. Now you can see the Sale point and the Delivery point with which you are interacting.
new_aesthetic.page_2: You can also view the new status iconography in the Purchase Orders, which will make it easier to track them.

mobile.page_1: We renewed our aesthetics for easier and clearer navigation.

page_1.title: New Purchase Order details
page_1.message: Now, You can access he information of a Purchase Order in dynamic and organized manner. On one side, you will see the general information and the product table. On the other, a comment, the activity and the supplier's data.
page_1.mobile: You can see all the information in the tab "Details", the moderations of the Purchase Order in "Activity" or the supplier's data in "Supplier".

page_2.title: Tracking number
page_2.message: Hover the mouse over the tracking number, a button with a pencil will appear, click on it to edit. Then assign a number, accept to save it and done!
page_2.mobile: Select the field and complete the modal with a tracking number. Accept to save and done!

page_3.title: Purchase Order activity
page_3.message: You can see the information of the users or suppliers that moderate a Purchase Order. Hover the mouse over their name and a card with the contact information will appear.
page_3.mobile: You can see the information of the users or suppliers that moderate an Purchase Order by selecting the their name.

page_4.title: Purchase Order activity
page_4.message: Now you can download the original PDF of a Purchase Order that was moderated. Hover over the activity with the mouse and a menu of options will appear. Click on it to download the PDF.
page_4.mobile: Now you can download the original PDF of an Purchase Order which was moderate by selecting the options menu.

not_found.title: Sorry, we have not found the page you are looking for.
not_found.try_again: To solve the problem try to reload the page. If this persist, return to the platform.

internal.title: Sorry, there was an error.
internal.try_again: To solve the problem try to reload the page. If this persists, report it to the support area (%email%).

not_compatible.title: Browser not compatible!
not_compatible.try_again: You have an outdated browser version. To continue you must update your browser.

next.title: You have no pending deliveries! Order products from your suppliers.

dismissed.title: What effectiveness!
dismissed.message: Here you will find all the Purchase Orders that will not be delivered.

all_fresh.title: You have not ordered any products yet!

sections.orders_in_one_place: All your orders in one place

welcome_email.body_part_1: Para ingresar al sistema, acceda haciendo click en la Endereço %site_url% con su Endereço de e-mail %email% y la siguiente contraseña:
welcome_email.body_part_2: Una vez ingresado al sistema, usted podrá modificar la contraseña asignada desde la configuración.
welcome_email.body_part_3: Cualquier consulta y/o modificación necesaria debe comunicarse con %email%
welcome_email.body:
Sr. cliente, fue dado de alta en el sistema de pedidos de Extendeal. Para ingresar, acceda a través de la dirección %site_url% con su dirección de e-mail %email% y la siguiente contraseña:

%password%

Una vez ingresado al sistema, usted puede modificar la contraseña asignada.
welcome_email.subject: Alta de Usuario

ordering_error.blocking_message: The deliveries will be deleted and the products they include will not be ordered from the supplier
ordering_error.request_message: The order #%number% was partially sent. If you continue some moderators may not be notified.
ordering_error.unblocking_message: The deliveries were partially sent. If you continue some users may not be notified.

add_product_error.add_error_message: Sorry, an error occurred while adding the product to the Cart. Please try again.

ordering.if_errors_continue: If the errors continue, please communicate with <button data-action='open-customer-support-modal' data-reason='3' class='order-result__message--link'>Customer support</button>
ordering.to_report_errors: To report the errors please communicate with <button data-action='open-customer-support-modal' data-reason='%reason%' class='order-result__message--link'>Customer support</button>

request.progress: Sending the order to the moderators
request.success: Order #%number% was sent successfully to the moderators.

success.heading: Your order #%number% is pending approval!
success.subtitle: The order will expire if is not approved before %date% at 11:59 PM.
success.subtitle_today: The order will expire today if is not approved before 11:59 PM.

fail.heading: Your order #%number% could not be sent!
fail.message: It was not posible to notify the corresponding moderators, you can redo your order, discard it or generate a new one.

checkout.waiting: Waiting to send delivery to the supplier %supplier%
checkout.error: Error sending delivery to the supplier %supplier%

success.heading: Your order #%number% has been placed!
success.message: Your order has been placed. It has been sent to the corresponding suppliers, waiting for confirmation.

fail.heading: Your order #%number% could not be placed!
fail.message: It was not posible to notify the corresponding suppliers, you can redo your order, discard it or generate a new one.

success.heading: The order #%number% has been approved!
success.message: You have approved your order, it was sent to the corresponding buyers.

fail.heading: The order #%number% could not be approved!
